title: So,,, when are the new bots going to be released to custom games
body:
Hi, 

Most of the time I have decent ping (like 50 - 150 ping) and I like to experiment things in custom games. I have heard about them releasing these new bots sometime in the future but when?

Also, riot had added a veigar, fizz and jinx bot recently and have removed fizz and jinx from custom games a few weeks after that. Any reason why that happened?

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/01/128-pbe-update.html
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/02/210-pbe-update.html
